mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTH_AUDITLOG_INF AUDITLOG_ID LIKE #{auditlogId}||'%' and IP LIKE #{ip}||'%' and MENU_NAME LIKE #{menuName}||'%' and U_ID LIKE #{UID}||'%' and USER_ID LIKE #{userId}||'%' and OPER_DATE >= #{startDate} and OPER_DATE <= #{endDate} AND ORG_NO = #{orgNo} AND ORG_NO IN( SELECT ORG_ID FROM AUTH_ORG_INF START WITH ORG_ID = #{currentOrgNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_ID = ORG_PAR_ID )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as NUM,AUDITLOG_ID,IP,MENU_NAME,U_ID,USER_ID,OPER_DATE FROM ( select AUDITLOG_ID,IP,MENU_NAME,U_ID,USER_ID,To_Char(to_date(OPER_DATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') OPER_DATE from AUTH_AUDITLOG_INF a AUDITLOG_ID LIKE #{auditlogId}||'%' and IP LIKE #{ip}||'%' and MENU_NAME LIKE #{menuName}||'%' and U_ID LIKE #{UID}||'%' and USER_ID LIKE #{userId}||'%' and OPER_DATE >=#{startDate} and OPER_DATE <=#{endDate} AND ORG_NO = #{orgNo} AND ORG_NO IN( SELECT ORG_ID FROM AUTH_ORG_INF START WITH ORG_ID = #{currentOrgNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_ID = ORG_PAR_ID ) ORDER BY OPER_DATE DESC )) WHERE NUM <= #{end} AND NUM >= #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_AUDITLOG_INF (AUDITLOG_ID, IP, MENU_NAME, U_ID, USER_ID, OPER_DATE,ORG_NO) VALUES (#{auditlogId}, #{ip}, #{menuName}, #{UID}, #{userId}, #{operDate},#{orgNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AUTH_MENU_INF MENU_ID = #{menuId} and MENU_NAME LIKE #{menuName}||'%' and MENU_STATUS = #{menuStatus} and MENU_TYPE = #{menuType} and MENU_PAR_ID = #{menuParId} and MENU_CODE = #{menuCode} and SYS_ID = #{sysId}
